text: Skazhi: "Yesli ottsy vashi, syny vashi, brat'ya vashi, suprugi vashi, rodstvenniki vashi, imushchestva, kakiye priobretayete sebe, tovary, za kotoryye boites' zastoya v rasprodazhe, zhilishcha, kotorymi udovletvoryayetes', dlya vas lyubezneye Boga, poslannika Yego, voyny na puti Yego, to zhdite, pokuda Bog ne sovershit svoyego dela: Bog ne rukovodit naroda razvrashchennogo
